values:
Update...


im falling for a girl i shouldn't be.and she knows it.
i think she knows it might be hurting me.i don't want to be just friends....i wish she would see it.she knows who she is....so beautiful. everything i could want. someone to hang out with me and the guys where my band plays. someone to support us. and to love me. more than she already does. she's always there for me when im down and i love her, i love her. and i don't want to lose her.
   so if she doesn't want a relationship with me. i can understand, but i don't want to lost this friendship. i got to know her. and she made a very large impact on my life.

i love you brittany



-brandon

i never update this thing.
bri was telling me i have to.

im sorry,but this thing is stupid
im only doing it to make her happy.

we had another show this weekend.
in dayton.

i haven't updated in awhile.
i hate this thing to be honest.
i don't know why i let bri talk me into it.
but i have nothing else to say.
i have a picture 
ill post it later.

keep rockin

-brandon

Easter.i hate holidays.

we had a show again.

i have nothing better to write about.

yeah we had a show last night...
it rocked dude.
Too bad bri couldn't join us.
i don't really want to write in this
i have nothing else to say.
